summary: The NFIP Extension Act of 2025 aims to reauthorize the National Flood Insurance Program (NFIP). The bill amends the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968, specifically sections related to financing and program expiration. It extends the program's authorization to September 30, 2025, from the previously stated date. A retroactive effective date of March 14, 2025, is included if the Act is enacted after that date.
